# Resource Management Application

A comprehensive resourcing application for Moody's Insurance Advisory team (50 professionals).

## Quick Start

See [QUICKSTART.md](./QUICKSTART.md) for local development setup.

## Deployment

See [RAILWAY_DEPLOYMENT.md](./RAILWAY_DEPLOYMENT.md) for Railway deployment instructions.

## Features

- ✅ Project definition and entry
- ✅ Task definition (training, PTO, other activities)
- ✅ Project planning and visualization
- ✅ User definition with skills and development areas
- ✅ Project time tracking and visualization
- ✅ User utilization tracking and visualization
- ✅ Activity tracking and visualization
- ✅ Automated resource allocation suggestions

## Tech Stack

- Frontend: React 18 + TypeScript + Vite + Tailwind CSS
- Backend: Node.js + Express + TypeScript
- Database: PostgreSQL (via Railway)
- ORM: Prisma
- Charts: Recharts
